mapper.insert: insert into step(sid, sname, sday, eday, pid, fid, methodologyid, mid, detail) values (seq_sid.nextval, #{sname}, #{sday}, #{eday}, #{pid}, #{fid}, #{methodologyid}, #{mid}, #{detail})
mapper.select: select pid from step where sid=#{sid}
select ts.TSTATUS, ts.TSTATUSID, ts.COLOR from step s join TSTATUS ts on s.METHODOLOGYID = ts.METHODOLOGYID where sid=#{sid}
select * from step where sid in (select sid from taskinstep where tid = #{tid})
mapper.update: update step set sname=#{sname}, mid=#{mid}, sday=#{sday}, eday=#{eday}, methodologyid=#{methodologyid}, pid=#{pid}, fid=#{fid}, detail=#{detail} where sid=#{sid}
mapper.delete: delete from task where tid = (select tid from taskinstep where (1 = (select count(*) from taskinstep where sid = #{sid})) and sid = #{sid})
mapper.update: update step set fid=#{fid} where sid=#{sid}
mapper.select: select TSTATUSID, TSTATUS, COLOR, ORDERING from TSTATUS where METHODOLOGYID= (select METHODOLOGYID from step where sid=#{sid})
select sid, sname from step where sid=#{sid}

select t.TID, t.TNAME, t.SDAY, t.EDAY,t.DETAIL,t.PID, t.CTIME,t.TSTATUSID, ts.SID , s.TSTATUS,s.COLOR from task t join TASKINSTEP ts on t.TID = ts.TID join TSTATUS s on t.TSTATUSID = s.TSTATUSID where ts.SID =#{sid} order by CTIME
select ts.TID, s.SID,s.SNAME from step s join TASKINSTEP ts on s.SID = ts.SID where ts.TID in (select tid from TASKINSTEP where SID =#{sid}) and s.SID !=#{sid}
select a.TID, m.MID, m.MNAME, m.IMAGE from member m join ASSIGNEE a on m.MID = a.MID where a.TID in (select tid from TASKINSTEP where SID =#{sid})
